item.title: 1107 Social Clusters (30分)-PAT甲级真题
item.description: When register on a social network, you are always asked to specify your hobbies in order to find some potential friends with the same hobbies. A "social cluster" is a set of people who have some of their hobbies in common. You are supposed to find all the clusters. Input Specification: Each input file contains one test case. For each test case, the first line contains a positive integer N
